author: Associated Press
title: Tom Brady Caught Breaking Tampa Lockdown Restrictions to Work Out in Park
description: Tampa Buccaneers quarterback Tom Brady was caught working out in a park that is closed to the public due to the coronavirus pandemic.
content: (TAMPA, Fla.) — Six Super Bowl rings may get you special treatment in a lot of places but former Patriots quarterback Tom Brady learned Monday that it won’t get you anything when you’re caught working out in a park that is closed to the public due to the coro… [+942 chars]
